call_title: Dev Update Sept. 15th 2024 |  Satergo, Paideia, Celaut, Sigs Mining, CU DAO, Rep System and more!

topics.title: Storage Rent Mechanism Deep Dive
topics.summary: Discussion of Ergo's storage rent feature, addressing misconceptions about trustlessness and explaining how it maintains fixed supply while preventing lost coins. Covers the charging mechanism (0.14-0.9 ERG per 4 years) and requires 90% consensus for protocol changes.

topics.title: Wallet Security and Trading Best Practices
topics.summary: Warning about potential scam wallets and services, discussing ErgoDEX rebranding separation from Spectrum. Strong emphasis on using separate trading wallets and being cautious with unknown services like ergodex.com.

topics.title: MewMart Auction House and Sigmanauts Integration
topics.summary: Overview of MewMart's enhanced auction house features including bundle sales and escrow functionality. Discussion of integration plans for Sigmanauts merchandise with privacy-conscious shipping API.

topics.title: Cyberverse Gaming and Car Minting
topics.summary: Brief update on Cyberverse's car minting feature with cross-chain functionality on Cardano. Describes the nostalgic gaming experience similar to opening collectible items.

topics.title: Developer Chat Updates - Core Development
topics.summary: Updates from kushti on Ergo protocol development including thread pool rework for 5.0.23 client, sub-blocks implementation progress, and new DevNet release preparations with Sigma 6.0 testing.

topics.title: Cornell University DAO Implementation
topics.summary: Details of creating a Paideia DAO for Cornell AAP students with $50,000 in voting funds for computer lab improvements. Plans to create a campus digital economy for peer-to-peer transactions and tool trading.

topics.title: Sigmanauts Mining Pool Infrastructure Upgrade
topics.summary: Marc's development of MegaCore containerized mining solution with new dashboard and API. Discussion of expansion plans to Cardano stake pools for cross-chain mining adoption and education.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Operations and MetaMask Integration
topics.summary: Updates on Rosen Bridge including MetaMask integration and eRosen support. Discussion of a 30,000 ERG transaction delay due to hot wallet limits and GraphQL infrastructure dependencies.

topics.title: SigmaSpace Explorer Alternative and Storage Rent Dashboard
topics.summary: PGR456's development of a full blockchain index and storage rent dashboard, plus plans for a drop-in replacement for current Explorer API to reduce infrastructure dependencies.

topics.title: Reputation System and Paideia Emoji Bug Fix
topics.summary: Updates on LAW project's reputation system for social trust and Paideia's fixes for emoji character handling in DAO names. Humorous discussion about clown token DAO breaking the system.
